sourcesContent:
import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' function Ticket() { const {date,time} = useParams() const [tickets,setTicket] = useState({ id: 0, userName: "", mobNumber: "", bookedDate: "", movieTime: "", status: 0 }) useEffect(()=>{ loadTicket() },[]) //http://localhost:3005/ticket?bookedDate=2020-08-31&movieTime=10:20:00 const loadTicket = ()=>{ axios.get("http://localhost:3005/ticket?bookedDate="+date+"&movieTime="+time) .then(res=>{ setTicket(res.data) }) } return (

Tickets for Date: {date} ans Time: {time}

{ tickets.map((ticket)=>( )) }
Id User Name Mobile Number Booked Date Movie Time Status
{ticket.id} {ticket.userName} {ticket.mobNumber} {ticket.bookedDate} {ticket.movieTime} {ticket.status}
) } export default Ticket
